## GlyphData class

Structure containing all the required information necessary to render a BMFont glyph using \[\[TextCanvas\]\].

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare class GlyphData 
```

## Constructors

|  Constructor | Modifiers | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  [(constructor)(codePoint, block, width, height, advanceX, offsetX, offsetY, u0, v0, u1, v1, texture, font)](./harp-text-canvas.glyphdata._constructor_.md) |  | Creates a new <code>GlyphData</code> object. |

|  [positions](./harp-text-canvas.glyphdata.positions.md) |  | THREE.Vector3\[\] | Array containing the positions for all corners of this glyph. |
|  [sourceTextureCoordinates](./harp-text-canvas.glyphdata.sourcetexturecoordinates.md) |  | THREE.Vector2\[\] | Array containing the source texture coordinates for all corners of this glyph. Used to sample the original texture atlas pages. |
